name: async-recorder
description: A sample Electron application for screen and camera recording using VideoDB Capture SDK
author: VideoDB

extendInfo.NSScreenCaptureUsageDescription: Async Recorder needs screen recording permission to capture your display during sessions.
extendInfo.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Async Recorder needs microphone access to capture audio during sessions.
extendInfo.NSCameraUsageDescription: Async Recorder needs camera access to capture your webcam during sessions.
